22.eng-name: Oaths and Vows (Kitab Al-Aiman Wa Al-Nudhur)

hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn 'Umar:That 'Umar said: Messenger of Allah, I took a vow in pre-Islamic times that I would stay in the sacred mosque (Masjid Haram) as a devotion (i'tikaf). The Prophet (ﷺ) said: Fulfill your vow

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ نَذَرَ فِي الْجَاهِلِيَّةِ ثُمَّ أَدْرَكَ الإِسْلاَمَ
chapter.eng-name: If A Person Made A Vow In Jahiliyyah Then Entered Islam
